Name: Hema
Title: Worst
Review: Staff are very rude they wont even allow to touch the playing equipment if your not buying their game card , you can't even try or even touch the gaming stuff unless you pay for them.They are so mean and behaviour is so rudeImax is much better it atleast allows the customers to touch and try before playing and buyingWaste of such staff

Name: Chichuu
Title: Craving for redvelvet and thickshake
Review: Creamstone  & thickshake kosam ma chichu ostundi ready ga petandi ayya babu...2..3mnths nunchiwaiting

Name: jai srikar
Title: Big mall
Review: It was good to see all brands come together at one place....connected to panjagutta metro station. But everything is costly there...especially PVR hall

Name: Niya1315
Title: Big Mall
Review: Next Galleria Mall is connected with Punjagutta Metro Station on the second floor. The mall is big with almost all brands. The food court is on the top floor. Many eating joints are there.

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Mall Directly Connected To Metro
Review: I am a big fan of this mall as it is directly connected to metro and so very easy to get there. Other good thing is that it has a really nice multiplex. Also it has a good collection of restaurants and fast food outlets like bade miyan kebabs, nor-fest dhaba, kfc, mamu, taco bell, burger king, ibaco etc. For shopping you have multiple stores like Shoppers stop, Hamleys, Pantaloons, Big Baazar, Miniso etc.

Name: vamsikrishna
Title: Mall cum  food cum movies cum shopping
Review: I share my wonderful experiences about PVR central mall it is located in Panjagutta Hyderabad.It is one of the nice place to watch the cinemas and good and attractive mall in Hyderabad.In this mall we can find the different categorizes, gadgets and theater in different complexes.The Ambience was very beautiful and good.It is thee very large screen .They provide what are the updated movies in cinema industry and they offer movie tickets with less price and reasonable cost just Rs.150 it is less amount compare to other theaters.In this mall we get the good parking place no need to worry about vehicle parking with good security.Picture quality is very good and coming to sound system is very high quality.Entire theater consists of full ac and they provide good sitting arrangements.Value for products is worthy and reasonable . So I always preferred this theater it is very good for enjoying the movies.

Name: prudhvi
Title: NEW MALL INTO HYDERABAD
Review: This mall is easy to locate, which lies in connection to panjagutta metro.You can directly enter into the mall from panjagutta metro station.This mall looks like a giant ship from outside.Mall is well maintained.There are wide varieties of clothings, gaming zones, what not everything.Dominos,subway ,burger king and many other food stalls are available.Rest rooms are tidy.Best place to enjoy with friends.

Name: Vikas Singh
Title: Poor food court. Many outlets still to open up
Review: The only positive about this mall is that it is never too crowded even though it is next to the metro station. The food court can hardly be called one given a few outlets that at best serve ice creams and Coca cola! The highlight of the mall is Decathlon store. The PVR theater here is quite nice though.

Name: Prudhvi
Title: Good place to visit in free time
Review: The mall has several brand store like pantaloons, max, brand factory and many more. There is a food court to eat. There's a box office to watch cinemas and play zone for kids. Overall it was a good experience.

Name: SMF Abdi
Title: A whole new world
Review: Very nice mall with a lot of premium brands as well as mid range. Nice and spacious. Located in panjagutta. Easily accessible. Parking is ample.

Name: anand887
Title: Lovely Time
Review: Beautiful ❤️ place to visit near Ameerpet we really enjoyed...Must visit.....!!!You will be glad to see people around you and the decor

Name: VijayMadari
Title: Went to movies with family
Review: Nice Place to watch movies. House keeping Dept. Aruna/Raviteja/Anuradha helped my children very well.

Name: Rajesh D
Title: Good place for weekend
Review: It is for all kind of people to shop, dine and play, one place for all kind of enjoyment.PVR cinemas also available to watch favorite movies in once place.

Name: Stay282088
Title: Mall in the shape of a Ship!!
Review: We went to this mall with my six year old girl on her birthday. She very much enjoyed the play area in this mall. Also the food options like chat, ice creams, cakes, etc.,are great. Moreover, the metro is directly linked with skywalk to this mall. Overall a nice experience.

Name: Wilayat
Title: Browsing around
Review: This is brand new mall in irrum manzil near the metro station, their are some new fast food chain added like pizzetto, wafl cafe, dounken monkey, frankee & in the basement their is decathlon store for sports lover

Name: jainms
Title: Very large mall
Review: The construction of the mall is very nice and even the maintenance too. been her for movie and it was good experience.

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Nice Mall With Various Eating Options
Review: This is a nice mall which is directly connected to the metro and has different eating outlets.I love their multiplex and mostly watch movies here. But this time I visited this place to buy a messenger bag as well as eat dinner. I bought a nice messenger bag from Shoppers stop outlet and did have a delicious kebab dinner at Nor-Fest dhaba on the 3 rd floor.

Name: worldcascade
Title: Nice theater, food court and shopping
Review: Galleria mall has nice theatre, well maintained, ample food stalls and shops. The mall is located next to the metro station which make it more accessible. Also, there is ample vehicle parking, so you don't have to worry even during a crowded day.

Name: Madhavi
Title: Convenient Mall
Review: These malls are located besides prominent metro stations. Easy to swing by and get some shopping done without going through the hassle of parking, driving etc. Good selection of shops and food places.

Name: Sailu
Title: NO Surveillance or NO security in the PARKING
Review: We have parked our bike(Royal Enfield red clr) on 18.8.2019 (3.45 to 4.00 PM). We have returned to parking around 10 PM and shocked to see that the speedometer set, dome (cockpit) part is broken and entirely dislocated.Previously, a two weeks back, similarly we have noticed scratches on the tank of our bike when we returned to take our bike from the parkingVery much disappointed with the POOR MAINTENANCE and NO SECURITY ALERT, especially in the PARKING AREAS.Kindly give strict instructions to the security staff to watch or monitor the vehicles parked in all the three level cellars. And observe if any person is in 'suspect' condition or stags / boys doing mischievous things in the parking lot.It cost us Rs.3000 to recover from the damage caused to our bike

Name: ramakrishnabanoth3
Title: NEXT GEN Mall
Review: With all the features like play house,Movie and shopping and good number of kids play station. Good place to have fun .

Name: Ravi M
Title: yderabad standards it is a good place for Shopping , Movies and food. For me, Delhi/NCR malls are so much larger, b
Review: For Hyderabad standards it is a good place for Shopping , Movies and food. For me, Delhi/NCR malls are so much larger, better in terms of International Brands and multi cuisine world class restaurants. The Galleria Mall is well located in the upmarket Banjara Hills. No problem about parking and no queues at the movie hall ans no waiting to get into a restaurant. The Big Bazar has facility for baggage drop for travellers who do not have to lug around with their bags. A nice experience overall.

Name: EaterNGo
Title: boring
Review: whats here? other than cinema and pricey outlet..ops..ya there are rich people who looks hop here..but NOT ME..not worth it...finally went to value bazaar at G floor and bought lassi to drink..burppp

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: The Only Mall in Hyderabad which is Directly connected to the Metro
Review: The best thing about this mall is that you can go directly to the first floor of the mall from the metro. Also it has all the major anchor stores like Shoppers Stop, Pantaloons, Big Baazar and a huge multiplex "PVR Playhouse". I also like their food court which is the best in terms of sheer variety of food outlets. Other than the food court they have a coffee shop on the ground floor "Cafe Coffee Day" and fast food outlets like Pizza hut, KFC, Mamu, Norfest dhaba on the 4 th floor next to the multiplex. There is also a Japanese store "Miniso" on the basement floor and a Korean outlet right next to the entrance from the metro. There is a gaming area "Busters" on the top floor next to the food court.

Name: sugunapriya b
Title: Spacious mall with best stores
Review: This Titanic shaped mall gave an awesome shopping experience to us. Usually we are malls Hoppers and this one looked more spacious even on a weekend and found most of our favorite stores in one place. The food court is good and as I said finding my favorite Melting pot was another happy moment for me. .

Name: Naz_Aadam
Title: Shopping visit
Review: The place is very well built, and nice and spacious lots of variety of shops. We had something to eat and the food court is nice and spacious.There was a downside, the toilets are in poor condition. It’s like they ran out of money and made some random toilets. There wasn’t a changing table for my toddler did not look very clean the floor was really dirty and the cleaners were not helpful at all. She was drinking tea in the loo area with her friends.

Name: chjprakash
Title: spacious
Review: the mall is very huge and it is nicely kept. there are all sorts of brands in the mall and many restaurants in the food court.

Name: ramesh
Title: Very convenient from metro station.
Review: The mall has a very good lineup of brands. the best part it has a direct skywalk from the nearest metro station.

Name: Deboli D
Title: Awesome Mall
Review: Yesterday I visited this mall to watch the film Manikarnika . I was pretty impressed with the Mall starting from the parking facility , the ambiance,the shops and the food court. Name a brand and it was there with their awesome collection. Was too happy to see William Pen and Nykaa as soon as I entered the Mall. Collections at Neerus , W, shoppers stop , soch....was just awesome. You really have a good choice of food there. The movie hall was very clean with awesome sound systems.last but not the least was very impressed with the valet parking...they didn’t keep us waiting long in this cold temperature unlike other malls. I will rate it as one of the best malls of our Hyderabad and very centrally located.

Name: Mr. KEY
Title: Amazing mall, great brand line up
Review: Well, a lot of Indian brands, so be careful to skip them. You can find many European brands and that's lovely. Neat and big, crowdy at times, but I like it.

Name: Ravindra V
Title: Almost occupied now
Review: Good size mall with stores like Bib Bazaar, Pantaloons, Shoppers Stop, max etc. The mall is almost completely occupied now with many shops. Good collection of stores. There is Taco Bell, Burger King, Pizza Hut etc in addition to food court on the top floor. Has PVR multiplex with special PVR Playhouse screen. Has direct access to Punjagutta metro station which is very convenient.

Name: chandrasekhar g
Title: Best place for movies and shoppping
Review: I saw robo 2.o movie at Next galleria madhapur.Shopping malls,food courts and movies theatres are available.

Name: pardhreddyc
Title: The worst mall-PVR cinemas
Review: We went on 13th October 2018 to watch movie small foot..at 7:30pm show..show did not start at 7:30 pm and however it was started at 8:05 PM and the reason the show team gave us was,”first 15 minutes adds only” ,so we would be directly playing movie...but even after that adds were telecasted for next 15 to 20 minutes.The hanging chairs on backside were removed and placed on the gloor,where few were broken and my kids while playing hot hurt and finally we spent 1000rs for doctor on nextday..maintenace of play house is horrible and they just looting money from customers.We ordered popcorn and samosa with no bill.The answer what we got from him was”Shop is not opened”.How comw shop was not opened ....We got seating at G1 to 4,where earlier there was a barricade to avoid falling from the step,but yesterday they removed and we were worried a lot  about kids while they were moving at this area..I suggest this galleria mall should be visisted by Govt officials to check for the safety and the frauds that being executed by the mall prople.

Name: Shashank1961
Title: Great New Mall near Punjagutta Metro Station
Review: Hyderabad Next Galleria Mall is located just beside Punjagutta Metro Station.Shoppers Stop is very big and the best in twin cities.Food court is OK but limited space & options. For Mexican food lovers,Taco Bell is there. All usual upmarket brand stores are there like Soch, American Tourister etc. Big Bazaar outlet is also available for quick grocery shopping. Overall rating- 4 Stars.

Name: Voyager820777
Title: Awesome but food court
Review: Nice Mall. Movie theatre is awesome but the food court is bad (Not the food). Places like KFC and BURGER KING have very less seating space. KFC hardly has 9-10 tables. Food court can be improved. Seating is the only problem. Rest everything is good. Nice place for shopping too!! The gaming centre was awesome. I have never seen such advanced technology.

Name: Mir A
Title: VERY GOOD BUT NOT EXCELLENT
Review: I Visited with my friends.Mall is very good but not better then GVK One & Sujana Malll.Because GVK one & Sujana Mall entrance really awesome and this mall entrance simple please adjust it next time I will come with my family.Big bazar employees working very slow.

Name: ram2001aditya
Title: Imitated food court that was not authentic enough
Review: This review is purely on food court that didn't have proper black coffee options which is quite essential basic.  Except for some good food brands , there no local affordable nutritious good quality food options, This applies to all pseudo western malls in India.

Name: Georgio Valentino Rayala
Title: Nice Mall But Many Shops Yet To Open
Review: It is a nice mall which has opened recently and it is located in the lane opposite to the Central Mall in Panjagutta area. I went there along with a friend to watch movie "Black Panther" at the PVR Cinemas which is located inside this mall. Also it is huge and has anchor stores like Shoppers Stop, Pantaloons, Reliance Trends as well as many other stores but not many of them have opened. There is a food court on the Level 05 opposite to the PVR cinemas.

Name: yakubp022
Title: best visit the mall rock
Review: good mall best deals best shopping mall best games zone movie screen good good security good parking good whether service is good.

Name: Emmanuel P
Title: Spacious Mall, Good Shopping & Food
Review: One Stop mall for fashion geeks, food lovers and a retreat place to enjoy with your friends.  The shopping will go from economy to luxury. The mall has well spacious parking place, and the entire mall is well maintained.    Still there are a few more shops which are yet to open.  This mall has special PVR Playhouse screen.

Name: mohdyakubpasha3
Title: Next galeria mall
Review: Good fashion and amazing games and movie screen best in my city.Food is good, most vistable place I love this mall. Parking is awasome

Name: Ravindra V
Title: Good size mall
Review: Good size mall with stores like pantaloons, Shoppers Stop, max etc. There are some more shops which are yet to open. Good collection of stores. Food options are limited to Taco Bell, Burger King, Pizza Hut etc. Some more food options are yet to open. Has PVR multiplex with special PVR Playhouse screen.

Name: raviy4248
Title: Very good mall
Review: This is a very nice mall with all the facilitaties specially suited for the people who do not like the busy look of the  in city malls. Big parking place is available and lot of stores to do.
